===Noun===

# {{lb|zh|archaic}} the [[w:son of heaven|son of heaven]]; the [[emperor]]

===Usage notes===
This term originally gained popularity during the [[w:Spring and Autumn Period|Spring and Autumn Period]] in reference to the [[w:Zhou Dynasty|Zhou]] kings. Later on, the term [[天子]] gradually gained more favor.
